author: iEhrepus
content:
hi pdp:

demos links doesn't work now,where can i get some demos ?

author: pdp
content:
hi iEhrepus, the demos are not available anymore since we changed the design of the library some time ago, but you can still get the old SVN stuff from here: http://attackapi.googlecode.com/svn/tags/attackapi-0.8/

At the moment we are working on better structure of the libraries and this may take time since I am the main developer and I am currently busy with other things as well. Thanks for the interest.

author: pdp
content: hi everybody, we had to re-engineer the entire project. look around the site in order to find what we are working on.
